title: Senior .NET .Netcore developer
description:
- Develop company product systems on Cloud service, blockchain with microservices architect.
- Research and implement the highest security solutions and the best performance to the system.
- Deploy and maintain products on cloud services (Windows Azure, Amazon Web Services).
- To deliver advanced crypto products that are easy to use for beginning and advanced users.
- Design database structures and develop and modify database code
- Develop robust, scalable custom code solutions for the application
- Provide system and software development services for the application
- Designing system configurations
- Performing and assisting with integration tests
requirements:
- Huge passion for .NET, Blockchain technology, and cryptocurrency.
- Has experience with .netcore, microservices
- Has experience with react.js/angular.js or vue.js
- Responsibility, self-motivation, independence, critical thinking.
- Know how to write stored procedures, functions, etc. for Azure database
- Experience in C# and .NET framework or Java Spring Boot to develop web-based applications.
- Experience in both Relational and Non-Relational Data Stores.
- Strong understanding of version control systems
- Good English vocabulary and grammar.
